help.main: [bold green]MLV-Lab CLI[/bold green]: Visual AI Learning Ecosystem.
help.list: List available units or environments from a specific unit.
help.train: Train an agent. If no seed is specified, a random one is generated.
help.eval: Evaluate an agent interactively by default; use --rec to record.
help.view: Launch the interactive view associated with an environment.
help.shell: Starts an interactive session (REPL) to run mlvlab commands.
help.in_shell: You are already in an interactive shell. Use 'exit' or 'quit' to exit.
help.help: Show technical specifications and documentation link for an environment.
help.docs: Show technical specifications and open documentation in browser.

config.no_config_file: No configuration file found. Using defaults.
config.key_value_required: Both key and value are required for 'set' action.
config.invalid_locale: Invalid locale. Use 'en' for English or 'es' for Spanish.
config.unknown_action: Unknown action: {action}. Use: get, set, or reset

options.record: Record and generate evaluation video instead of just viewing.

repl.welcome: Welcome to the MLV-Lab interactive session.
repl.exit_tip: Type 'exit' or 'quit' (or press Ctrl+D) to exit.
repl.goodbye: Stay up to date with the latest news on our website. See you later!
